Fighters.Name: Bruce Lee
Fighters.Text: At the end of your turn, you may move Bruce Lee 1 space.

Card.Name: Skirmish
Card.Text: After combat: If you won the combat, choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 2 spaces.

Card.Name: Little Dragon
Card.Text:
During combat: If your hand is empty, the value of this card is 6 instead.
After combat: Draw 2 cards.

Card.Name: Taste of Blood
Card.Text: After combat: If Bruce Lee has 5 or less health, draw 3 cards.

Card.Name: Be Like Water
Card.Text: After combat: Choose a JEET KUNE DO card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

Card.Name: "HOO! WHAAAAAA!"
Card.Text: Choose a JEET KUNE DO card in your discard pile and add it to your hand. Gain 1 action.

Card.Name: Jeet Kune Do: High Straight Lead
Card.Key: Bruce Lee_Jeet Kune Do: High Straight Lead
Card.Text:
During combat: If either fighter started this turn in a different space, this card's value is 5 instead.
After combat: Gain 1 action.
Card.Script: ../Bruce Lee/Jeet Kune Do: High Straight Lead.lua

Card.Name: Jeet Kune Do: Downward Side Kick
Card.Key: Bruce Lee_Jeet Kune Do: Downward Side Kick
Card.Text: After combat: Your opponent discards 1 random card. Gain 1 action.
Card.Script: ../Bruce Lee/Jeet Kune Do: Downward Side Kick.lua

Card.Name: Jeet Kune Do: Wrist Lock
Card.Key: Bruce Lee_Jeet Kune Do: Wrist Lock
Card.Text: After combat: Draw 1 card. Gain 1 action.

Card.Name: Jeet Kune Do: Intercepting Fist
Card.Key: Bruce Lee_Jeet Kune Do: Intercepting Fist
Card.Text:
Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
After combat: Gain 1 action.

Card.Name: Jeet Kune Do: Corkscrew Finger Jab
Card.Key: Bruce Lee_Jeet Kune Do: Corkscrew Finger Jab
Card.Text: After combat: Deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter. Gain 1 action.
Card.Script: ../Bruce Lee/Jeet Kune Do: Corkscrew Finger Jab.lua

Card.Name: Jeet Kune Do: Short Lead Hook
Card.Key: Bruce Lee_Jeet Kune Do: Short Lead Hook
Card.Text: After combat: Bruce Lee may swap spaces with the opposing fighter. Gain 1 action.
Card.Script: ../Bruce Lee/Jeet Kune Do: Short Lead Hook.lua

Card.Name: Bring It On
Card.Text: Choose an opposing fighter in Bruce Lee's zone. Place them in any space adjacent to Bruce Lee. Gain 1 action.

Card.Name: One-Inch Punch
Card.Text: Deal 2 damage to an adjacent fighter. If this defeats that fighter, return this card to your hand instead of discarding it.

Card.Name: Nunchaku
Card.Text: All of Bruce Lee's attacks this turn are +1 value. Gain 1 action.

Card.Name: Momentous Shift
Card.Text: During combat: If your fighter started this turn in a different space, this card's value is 5 instead.

Card.Name: Feint
Card.Text: Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

Card.Name: Regroup
Card.Text: After combat: Draw 1 card. If you won the combat, draw 2 cards instead.
